settings.title: Our mission
settings.sub_text: Provide delicious healthy snacks that nourish the body and support overall wellness. We believe snacking should be a satisfying, guilt-free, and enjoyable experience without sacrificing nutrition or taste.

settings.title: Benefits Of
settings.sub_text: On Average, each person in the U.S. consumed 113 pounds of sugar each year, that’s 36 billion pounds of sugar in total.  That’s a whole lot of sugar.
settings.detail_text_1: Reducing sugar intake can help with weight control by reducing overall calorie intake and reducing the risk of obesity.
settings.detail_text_2: A diet low in added sugars can help regulate blood sugar levels and reduce the risk of developing type 2 diabetes.
settings.detail_text_3: Excessive sugar intake has been linked to high blood pressure, high cholesterol, and an increased risk of heart disease.
settings.detail_text_4: Sugar is a leading cause of tooth decay, and reducing sugar intake can help maintain healthy teeth and gums.
settings.detail_text_5: Cutting back on sugar can help make room in the diet for healthier foods like fruits, vegetables, and whole grains, providing essential nutrients and fiber.
settings.detail_text_6: High sugar intake has been linked to inflammation in the body, which is a risk factor for a number of chronic diseases.
settings.detail_text_7: Reduced sugar intake can help reduce feelings of fatigue and increase overall energy levels and mental clarity.
